artist: Artist: Joan Miró; Author: Jacques Prévert; Publisher: Maeght, Paris
description: unbound book in portfolio with printed cloth decorations on the spine, with custom beige cloth-covered clamshell box; paper cover with embossed design; colorful abstract images with cursive text; original prospectus for the book inside front cover
image_copyright: © Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C New York %2F ADAGP%2C Paris
markings:
Numbered in pencil on first artwork spread in book, LR: 61/200; number in red pencil on colophon page: 61
Watermark: Arches
medium: Color etchings with aquatint, blind embossing, and lithographic text; loose in portfolio
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
signed: Signed in pencil on first artwork spread in book: Miró. Signed in pencil by artist on colophon page: Miró; signed in red pencil, reportedly by the publisher, on colophon page: [indecipherable stylized letter, lines]
title: Adonides
